content.rendered:
The Sunday Business Post recently invited us to feature on their podcast, Media Matters.

Patrick Meade, Managing Director and partner at Boys + Girls, joined Colette Sexton to discuss what makes a good ad, what Brexit will mean for the industry, and whether Boys + Girls is up for sale.

excerpt.rendered: Listen to Patrick Meade on The Sunday Business Post’s podcast discussing what makes a good ad, Brexit and the industry, and whether Boys + Girls is up for sale.
